parts.text: My service requests are denied, and I can't use my purifier.
I'm not getting any help with my broken purifier.
My purifier isn't working, and I'm being denied service.
I've been asking for service, but my requests are being denied.
has been malfunctioning for days, and I've been unable to drink proper water. Yet, my requests for after-service keep getting denied. I'm really upset about this.
